thread.title_full: Bella Hadid 'Still Loves' The Weeknd & Is 'Bitter' About His Relationship With Selena Gomez! | PerezHilton.com

author: perezhilton
title: Bella Hadid 'Still Loves' The Weeknd & Is 'Bitter' About His Relationship With Selena Gomez! | PerezHilton.com
text:
In a love triangle, someone is always going to get hurt…
As we reported , on Tuesday, new couple Selena Gomez and The Weeknd were spotted kissing outside Giorgio Baldi restaurant in Santa Monica. Once word spread, ex Bella Hadid unfollowed the Same Old Love singer on Instagram !
Related: Bella Hadid Is Stylish At The Airport 
While it's pretty obvious the model isn't 100% on board with the relationship, according to sources, she's actually pissed!
An insider said Gigi Hadid 's sister STILL has feelings for the Starboy musician, and isn't taking the news well at all. 
"She is actually not over The Weeknd. She still loves him… They are on fine terms, but she is bitter about the romance with Selena. She was not happy when all of that gossip went everywhere between The Weeknd and Selena… It really hurt her seeing Selena be all up on her man. She still feels like they have a connection." 
Awww! We know exactly how she feels! 
Although The Weeknd and Selly are a new couple, they've reportedly had an eye on each other for quite some time.
"[The Weeknd] always had a thing for Selena… He thinks she is extremely talented and sexy. They recently started talking before the holidays but she has been on his radar before… They are on the same level with expectations and think the other is really fun. They are taking things slow and getting to know each other." 
Hopefully, Bella will move on to an even better relationship! 
[ Image via WENN . ] 
Tags: bella hadid , breakups , gigi hadid , instagram , love line , models , music minute , selena gomez , the weeknd , young hollywood
